# 1

#### 363.11

```{r}
m = 0
v = 1/4

price = rnorm(10000,m,v)
len = length(price)

# >= 100
delta1 = (100-100)/(2*sqrt(364))  
length(price[price>=delta1])/len

# >=110
delta2 = (110-100)/(2*sqrt(364)) 
length(price[price>=delta2])/len

# >=120
delta3 = (120-100)/(2*sqrt(364)) 
length(price[price>=delta3])/len


```

# 2

#### binomial: p(x) = C(n,x)p^x(1-p)^(n-x)

#### mgf: Mx(t) = summation(e^(tx)*p)

#### => summation(e^(tx)*(C(n,x)*(p^x)*(1-p)^(n-x)))

#### => summation((pe^t)^x))*(C(n,x))*(1-p)^(n-x)))
#### (binomial thm) => (pe^t+(1-p))^n


#### mean: M'(t) = n(pe^t)*((1-p)+pe^t)^(n-1)

#### (t = 0) => n(p)*((1-p)+p)^(n-1) => np * (1) = np []

#### M''(t)= n(n-1)(pe^t)^2((1-p)+pe^t)^(n-2)+n(pe^t)((1-p)+pe^t)^(n-1)

#### (t= 0) => n(n-1)*p^2 +n(p)

#### => n(n-1)p^2+np = M''(0)

#### var : M''(0)-(M'(0))^2 

#### =>  n(n-1)p^2+np - (np)^2 => np(1-p) []


# 3

#### exponential: p(x) = le^(-lx)

#### mgf: Mx(t) = integral(e^(tx)*p)

#### => integral(e^(tx)*le^(-lx))

#### => integral(l*(e^(x(t-l))))

#### => -(l*e^(x(t-l)))/(t-l)

#### (x= 0) => -(l)/(t-l) => -l/(t-1)

#### M'(t) = l/(t-l)^2

#### mean = M'(t=0)

#### (t= 0) => l/l^2 =  1/l []

#### M''(t) = -2l/(t-l)^3

#### (t= 0) => -2l/-l^3 => 2/l^2

#### var: M''(0)-(M'(0))^2

#### => 2/l^2 - (1/l)^2 = 1/l^2 []
